ComicInfo.Summary:
Trapped in an underground bunker, Julie fights with Annie over who should use her body for the escape, and poor Dillon is the referee! Meanwhile, Dan's biker gang buries their fallen brothers. After the funeral, the boys mount up for an all out attack on HeNRI.
Julie wakes on Ivy's bed and on the news is the report on Cain's latest attack. She is worried because when she was out she talked with Annie and she would only say that someone was dead. She contact Dillon and finds him alive. . While on the phone a hired killed walks into Dan's bar and kills the staff. Dan gets Dillon through a secret floorboard exit as the killer blows up the bar.
Vijay is debriefed by Jack who tells him to say nothing.
Ivy and Julie head back to HENRI to get more of the suit so it cant be used in the super-collider.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:42:25. [CVDB204275]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cain, Dillon Murphy, Ivy M. Raven, Julie Martin
